snippet: Phil Hughes won consecutive starts, Raul Ibanez homered for the second day in a row and the Yankees beat their former prospect Hector Noesi.
abstract: New York Yankees defeat the Seattle Mariners, 6-2; Yankees pitcher Phil Hughes wins consecutive starts and outfielder Raul Ibanez homers for the second day in a row.
lead_paragraph: Phil Hughes won consecutive starts, Raul Ibanez homered for the second day in a row and the Yankees beat their former prospect Hector Noesi.

headline.seo: Phil Hughes Delivers Victory for Yankees
headline.main: Strong Start by Hughes Carries Yankees
headline.print_headline: Hughes Wins Over the Crowd With a Long, Steady Performance
